channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWAN
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWAN

item.title: CVE-2021-26113|2024-10-22T20:58:07.517Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwan
item.description: A use of a one-way hash with a predictable salt vulnerability [CWE-760] in FortiWAN before 4.5.9 may allow an attacker who has previously come in possession of the password file to potentially guess passwords therein stored.
